        public void register(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry<?> object)
        Description copied from class: OtflApi
        Register an object from an IForgeRegistryEntry.
        That means that it can be anything registerable from the OTFL library, such as an item or a block.
        Specified by:
        register in class OtflApi
        Parameters:
        object - the IForgeRegistryEntry to register
